abilities.name: Infiltrator
abilities.description: You are not affected by quality or Tier when you bypass security measures.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: When you attack from hiding or spring a trap, you get +1d.

abilities.name: Daredevil
abilities.description: When you roll a desperate action, you get +1d to your roll if you also take -1d to any resistance rolls against consequences from your action.

abilities.name: The Devil's Footsteps
abilities.description: When you push yourself, choose one of the following additional benefits: perform a feat of athletics that verges on the superhuman—maneuver to confuse your enemies so they mistakenly attack each other.

abilities.name: Expertise
abilities.description: Choose one of your action ratings. When you lead a group action using that action, you can suffer only 1 stress at most regardless of the number of failed rolls.

abilities.name: Ghost Veil
abilities.description: You may shift partially into the ghost field, becoming shadowy and insubstantial for a few moments. Take 2 stress when you shift, plus 1 stress for each extra feature: It lasts for a few minutes rather than moments—you are invisible rather than shadowy—you may float through the air like a ghost.

abilities.name: Reflexes
abilities.description: When there's a question about who acts first, the answer is you (two characters with Reflexes act simultaneously).

abilities.name: Shadow
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence from detection or security measures, or to push yourself for a feat of athletics or stealth.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.
